text: Göran Hård af Segerstad (born 31 March 1945) is a former Swedish handball player who competed in the 1972 Summer Olympics. In 1972 he was part of the Swedish team which finished seventh in the Olympic tournament. He played five matches and scored three goals. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish male handball players Category:Olympic handball players of Sweden Category:Handball players at the 1972 Summer Olympics
title: Göran Hård af Segerstad
